page.title: 20"WE LIKE IT HERE"
page.content:
The people of this area like both the rural atmosphere and the convenience of good road and rail links with places of employment and amenities. However, several people suggested ways in which the quality of life could be improved such as better pavements, restrictions on dogs, a local police- man to prevent rubbish dumping and vandalism, and the end of further building development.The major complaint was that there were no local facilities for the large numbers of teenagers who have grown up here. But the people who chose to move here to provide a pleasant home life for their families are generally satisfied and have no desire to move away.
Data compiled by{THE PUPILS AND STAFF of{DODDINGHURST JUNIOR SCHOOL
